review_text: I have an older vacuum and was worried that I wouldn't be able to find the right kind of bags for it, but I looked around on Amazon and found these.  They are allergen filtration bags and trap dust mites, mold and cat dander.  The Type A is still used in quite a few vacuum cleaners from what I read on the bags, so these should be available for some time.
product_name: Hoover 4010001A Type A Vacuum Bags, 3 Bags
